rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现地中海饮食可减少环境影响并改善代谢健康研究人员发现，减少能量摄入的地中海饮食可以显着减少代谢综合征患者的环境影响，例如酸化、富营养化和土地利用。热量减少和饮食坚持是调节这些益处的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Mediterranean-diet-cuts-environmental-impact-and-improves-metabolic-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Mediterranean-diet-cuts-environmental-impact-and-improves-metabolic-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ff02671-766f-4b4b-b453-a07fee66e8cc Mon, 27 May 2024 00:36:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet cuts environmental impact and improves metabolic health, study finds
研究发现生酮饮食可改善精神分裂症和双相情感障碍患者的代谢和心理健康研究人员发现，生酮饮食可显着改善精神分裂症或双相情感障碍患者的代谢和精神健康，体重、腰围和精神疾病严重程度显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Ketogenic-diet-improves-metabolic-and-mental-health-in-schizophrenia-and-bipolar-disorder- Patients-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240527/Ketogenic-diet-improves-metabolic-and-mental-health-in-schizophrenia-and-bipolar-disorder- Patients-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58a74be8-2fac-4dd0-bd7e-38679fb43bd7 Mon, 27 May 2024 00:23:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet improves metabolic and mental health in schizophrenia and bipolar disorder patients, study finds
植物化学物质有望通过影响肠脑轴来治疗神经系统疾病研究人员回顾了植物化学物质对肠脑轴的潜在治疗作用，发现它们可以通过调节肠道微生物群来影响大脑功能并减少神经系统症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Phytochemicals-show-promise-in-treating-neurological-disorders-by-influencing-the-gut-brain-axis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Phytochemicals-show-promise-in-treating-neurological-disorders-by-influencing-the-gut-brain-axis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07c44b2d-a961-4289-977b-ea553e8e5900 Sun, 26 May 2024 23:43:00 -0400 Phytochemicals show promise in treating neurological disorders by influencing the gut-brain axis
跑步疗法对心理健康的益处与抗抑郁药物相当，但对身体的益处却超过了抗抑郁药物研究人员发现，虽然抗抑郁药和团体跑步疗法都能有效改善焦虑和抑郁患者的心理健康，但跑步疗法对身体健康指标的影响明显更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Running-therapy-matches-antidepressants-for-mental-health-surpasses-for-physical-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Running-therapy-matches-antidepressants-for-mental-health-surpasses-for-physical-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e0b3d6c-3733-4e97-86cd-09332ab68a98 Sun, 26 May 2024 23:28:00 -0400 Running therapy matches antidepressants for mental health, surpasses for physical benefits
研究发现青少年吸食大麻与精神疾病风险较高有关研究人员发现，青春期吸食大麻会显着增加患精神疾病的风险，但这种风险在成年初期并不显着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Adolescent-cannabis-use-linked-to-higher-risk-of-psychotic-disorders-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Adolescent-cannabis-use-linked-to-higher-risk-of-psychotic-disorders-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da76488-d285-4967-8667-2fbeafaafe3f Sun, 26 May 2024 21:34:00 -0400 Adolescent cannabis use linked to higher risk of psychotic disorders, study finds
研究发现人体虱子可以传播鼠疫细菌研究人员改造了一种人体虱子菌株来研究它们与鼠疫耶尔森氏菌的感染动态，发现虱子可以被感染并传播鼠疫细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds- human-body-lice-can-transmit-plague-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds- human-body-lice-can-transmit-plague-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=209dc023-636d-4522-bc0e-d01e15785fe1 Sun, 26 May 2024 21:19:00 -0400 Study finds human body lice can transmit plague bacteria
索马鲁肽增加非糖尿病肥胖患者勃起功能障碍的风险研究人员发现，用于非糖尿病肥胖男性减肥的索马鲁肽治疗会增加勃起功能障碍和睾酮缺乏的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Increased-risk-of-erectile-dysfunction-with-semaglutide-in-non-diabetic-obese-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Increased-risk-of-erectile-dysfunction-with-semaglutide-in-non-diabetic-obese-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f78afa8-fad4-42e2-917f-1ed26e4aa3c4 Sun, 26 May 2024 21:08:00 -0400 Increased risk of erectile dysfunction with semaglutide in non-diabetic obese patients
研究发现，向上的社会经济流动性可降低痴呆症风险研究人员发现，一生中社会经济地位的向上转变会降低患痴呆症的风险并增加无痴呆期，而社会经济地位的向下转变则会增加患痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Upward-socioeconomic-mobility-reduces-dementia-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Upward-socioeconomic-mobility-reduces-dementia-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7321c9e-7d48-4a4c-a07b-3e7eca561939 Sun, 26 May 2024 20:57:00 -0400 Upward socioeconomic mobility reduces dementia risk, study finds
研究发现因缺血性异常勃起住院的人数增加研究人员分析了德国的全国数据，以评估高流量和低流量阴茎异常勃起住院病例的趋势和结果，发现因缺血性异常勃起住院的人数增加，而与镰状细胞病相关的病例减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds-rise-in-hospitalizations-for-ischemic-priapism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-finds-rise-in-hospitalizations-for-ischemic-priapism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd0b099c-6548-4e84-a6a7-70de44d051e5 Sun, 26 May 2024 20:40:00 -0400 Study finds rise in hospitalizations for ischemic priapism
研究表明健康的植物性饮食可降低痛风风险，不健康的饮食会增加痛风风险研究人员发现，健康的植物性饮食可以降低痛风的风险，而不健康的植物性饮食会增加痛风的风险，尤其是女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-shows-healthy-plant-based-diets-lower-gout-risk-unhealthy-diets-raise-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-shows-healthy-plant-based-diets-lower-gout-risk-unhealthy-diets-raise-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192ffb56-cbdd-4b58-87fe-261699a7ac89 Sun, 26 May 2024 20:32:00 -0400 Study shows healthy plant-based diets lower gout risk, unhealthy diets raise it
